mean_cn: adj.善于表达的；  v.明确表达；与……合成整体 ，使相互连贯（读作/ɑrˈtɪkjuˌleɪt/）
mean_en: (of a person) good at expressing ideas or feelings clearly in words
sentence: The articulate lawyer made a very persuasive defense for his client.
sentence_trans: 这位能言善辩的律师为他的当事人做出了极有说服力的辩护。
word_etyma: articul关节 + ate动词后缀 → articulate关节结合；咬字清楚
